mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_holeyness(n, edges):
    mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
    ki = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (a, b) in edges:
        ki[a - 1].append(b - 1)
        ki[b - 1].append(a - 1)
    n2 = [1]
    for i in range(n):
        n2.append(n2[-1] * 2 % mod)
    ans = 0

    def dfs1(v, p):
        nonlocal ans
        ret = 0
        ans += n2[n - 1] - 1
        for nv in ki[v]:
            if nv == p:
                continue
            x = dfs1(nv, v)
            ans -= n2[x] - 1
            ans -= n2[n - x] - 1
            ret += x
        ans %= mod
        return ret + 1
    dfs1(0, -1)
    allpat = pow(2, n, mod)
    ans /= pow(allpat, mod - 2, mod)
    return ans % mod
